H0.text: What slippery synthetic substance was Ronald Reagan compared to - because no scandals stuck to him. Silicone

H1.text: What slippery synthetic substance was Ronald Reagan compared to - because no scandals stuck to him. Nylon

H2.text: What slippery synthetic substance was Ronald Reagan compared to - because no scandals stuck to him. Polyurethane

H3.text: What slippery synthetic substance was Ronald Reagan compared to - because no scandals stuck to him. PFTE

A4.text: Silicone is no longer the correct term; the term siloxane is preferred according to the nomenclature of modern chemistry.
